name: scripts
body:
### welcome.
just a small collection of scripts that i find useful for monitoring/maintaining linux servers. your mileage may vary. i might add to them as time goes on. most (all?) should be run by an account with su authority. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
